sentences.en: Breathe out and ease your knees in toward your chest.
sentences.cn: 呼气，膝部放松向胸部靠拢。

sentences.en: He finally gave way to an impulse and pulled her toward him.
sentences.cn: 他最终还是没能抑制住冲动，把她拉向了自己。

sentences.en: I eventually realized I had to change my attitude toward medical practice.
sentences.cn: 我终于认识到自己不得不改变对医务工作的看法。

sentences.en: McKay walked slowly toward this screen, feeling a growing tenseness.
sentences.cn: 麦凯缓缓地朝这个屏幕走来，每走一步心情都更加紧张。

sentences.en: Mr. Lewis takes an insufferably glib attitude toward it all.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯先生对这一切不以为意，令人厌恶。

sentences.en: Sara, while remaining outwardly amiable toward all concerned, was inwardly furious.
sentences.cn: 萨拉尽管表面上对所有相关的人依然和蔼可亲，内心却怒火中烧。

sentences.en: She also began moving toward a different life-style.
sentences.cn: 她也开始转向一种不同的生活方式。

sentences.en: She began a slow saunter toward the bonfires.
sentences.cn: 她开始向篝火处慢慢走去。

sentences.en: The floor was level, but the ceiling sloped toward his head.
sentences.cn: 地板是平的，但天花板朝他的头这边倾斜。

sentences.en: The most popular items are located toward the back of the store.
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的产品放在靠近商店最里面的地方。

sentences.en: The raft gathered speed as the current dragged it toward the falls.
sentences.cn: 水流将木筏拽向瀑布，木筏的速度越来越快。

sentences.en: The truck lumbered across the parking lot toward the road.
sentences.cn: 卡车隆隆地驶过停车场准备上路。

sentences.en: This is an important step toward lower interest rates.
sentences.cn: 这是向较低利率迈出的重要一步。

sentences.en: We were driving along Interstate 280, toward my home in Woodside.
sentences.cn: 我们正驾车沿280号州际公路往我在伍德赛德的家行驶。

sentences.en: With perfect synchronization, two other girls cartwheeled toward the ropes.
sentences.cn: 另外两个女孩同时朝着绳索做侧手翻，动作整齐划一，完美无瑕。

words.tran_cn: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
